snippet: Researchers said they had discovered what looked for all the world like the Higgs boson, a long-sought particle that could lead to a new understanding of how the universe began.
abstract: Researchers say they have discovered a new subatomic particle that looks like the Higgs boson, a long-sought particle that could lead to a new understanding of how the universe began; it is predicted to imbue elementary particles with mass.
lead_paragraph: Researchers said they had discovered what looked for all the world like the Higgs boson, a long-sought particle that could lead to a new understanding of how the universe began.

headline.seo: Physicists Find Particle That Could Be the Higgs Boson
headline.main: Physicists Find Elusive Particle Seen as Key to Universe
headline.print_headline: Physicists Find Elusive Particle Seen as Key to Universe
